name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution Fengtai District, Beijing 
Free blood donation organized by Beijing Electric Power Hospital and bloodheads. In fact, the compensation for every 400cc varies from 500 to 1000. At the gate of Beijing Electric Power Hospital's outpatient department, more than 300 people lined up at 9 am. There was even a fight in the queue, and the bloodheads (scalpers) who were connected to the hospital pulled apart to mediate.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A summary of submissions on returning to normal life in various places

I am actually quite puzzled. Every day, patriotic big Vs in China post all kinds of tragic scenes of funeral homes and morgues being opened and use this as an excuse to discredit the black paper movement. I post some videos of people returning to normal life, but it turns out to be a big foreign propaganda
“No nucleic acid, but freedom” is talking about the scene in the video, isn’t it?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 25, a depositor of a Henan Village Bank contacted me and told me about his current situation and the situation he was facing. According to him, there are still more than 1,000 large depositors whose deposits have not been settled. They cannot sue or file a case, and they don’t know what to do in the future.
Yingxiandian: [Interview] Interview with a depositor of a Henan Village Bank on November 25
